amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funding for the United States Army School of the Americas located at Fort Benning, Georgia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any funding for the United States Army School of the Americas located at Fort Benning, Georgia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moakley amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 197 (Roll no. 352).
